summary:
Fortune: Paxos Expands to Solana Blockchain - Paxos, a leading regulated blockchain and tokenization infrastructure platform, is pleased to announce a strategic expansion to the Solana blockchain.

 CNBC: Solana Network Carbon Emissions Dropped 25% on a Per-Transaction Basis - Amira Valliani, head of policy of the Solana Foundation, joined CNBC’s Crypto World to discuss the latest findings in the latest Energy Use Report, as well the Foundation’s move to offset the network’s footprint using onchain carbon credits.
